name: HermesAlert
summary: A lightwight, fully customizable iOS alert framework.
description:
Hermes is a library thanks to which it's possible to create alerts graphically captivating, customizable and of various shapes. In applications it is often necessary
send messages to the user and Apple's system alert is increasingly used. This, however, is not graphically appealing and is not very customizable, and this is where Hermes comes in.
Thanks to Hermes, it is possible to take advantage of graphically appealing, customizable alerts with great animations, in place of system ones. With few lines of code
it will be possible to send messages to our users in a new and graphically appealing way.
